itunes:title: APR 15 2022 – THE REGIME STRIKES BACK, ELON TO ACTIVATE PLAN B
title: APR 15 2022 – THE REGIME STRIKES BACK, ELON TO ACTIVATE PLAN B
description:
Twitter adopts a ‘poison pill’ measure that could block Elon Musk from increasing stake, and Hillary Clinton donor, Ed Buck is sentenced to 30 years in prison for repeatedly injecting young black men with meth and killing them. Meanwhile, China stages military exercises as a bipartisan group of U.S. lawmakers visit Taiwan, and Mexican truckers blockade the border crossings over Texas inspection delays.


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec

To save on MyPillow go to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO


For more on Turning Point USA's Socialism Sucks series, ‘China: The World’s Loan Shark’ go to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6s4L1Q5yN04
